content:
Hello!

I have a Span trait for my errors crate, and i tend to use self.cur..self.cur + 1 a lot in my parser. I do not implement Span for RangeInclusive however, but clippy still suggests i use self.cur..=self.cur. Shouldn't it check if RangeInclusive is actually correct in that position?
this should just be a bug report I think
any time a suggestion fails to compile it's a bug
Ah ok, i was not quite sure, ill open an issue then
Opened an issue :thumbs_up: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust-clippy/issues/6561
heh my bad, i tried looking for one but github search is really bad apparently :laughing:
searching for the lint name in the issues brought it up :stuck_out_tongue_wink: But no problem. Reporting duplicates is better than not reporting :)
